Headline: #62 Archer Temporary Northbound Reroute near Wacker/Dearborn.
ShortDescription: Northbound #62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted via Dearborn, Randolph, LaSalle, Wacker, Clark  due to street blockage near Wacker/Dearborn.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted via Dearborn, Randolph, LaSalle, Wacker, Clark then resume their normal route on Archer due to street blockage near Wacker/Dearborn.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #29 State and #22 Clark Temporary Northbound Reroute near Wacker/Dearborn
ShortDescription: Northbound #29 State and  #22 Clark  buses are temporarily rerouted via Dearborn, Randolph, LaSalle, Illinois, due to street blockage near Wacker/Dearborn.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #29 State and  #22 Clark  buses are temporarily rerouted via Dearborn, Randolph, LaSalle, Illinois, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Wacker/Dearborn.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
